snippet: Gov. Neil Abercrombie signed a bill Wednesday legalizing gay marriage in Hawaii, which kicked off a national discussion of the issue more than two decades ago.
abstract: Hawaii Gov Neil Abercrombie signs a bill legalizing gay marriage.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Neil Abercrombie signed a bill Wednesday legalizing gay marriage in Hawaii, which kicked off a national discussion of the issue more than two decades ago.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
